import React, { useLayoutEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; function MainKonten(){ const [postModal, setpostModal] = useState (false); const textbox = useRef(null); function adjustHeight() { textbox.current.style.height = "inherit"; textbox.current.style.height = `${textbox.current.scrollHeight}px`; } useLayoutEffect(adjustHeight, []); function handleKeyDown(e) { adjustHeight(); } return (
{postModal && ( set(false)}/> )}
) }; function ModalPost(props){ return(
) }; export default MainKonten;
